items.headline: Markets are pricing in three rate cuts by year-end. Why the Fed might agree.
items.summary_en: A rate cut at the September Fed meeting looks like a done deal. Be careful with stocks and watch the dollar.

items.headline: The best-performing Dow stock this year isn’t Nvidia. How this bank rose to the top.
items.summary_en: Goldman Sachs’s stock has benefited from rate-cut expectations, a boom in IPO activity and a bet on one of the hottest areas of the lending market.

items.headline: These stock-market experts don’t love AI. Here’s what they do recommend.
items.summary_en: I’ll bet you think that investment newsletters’ most-recommended stock is Nvidia Corp., the AI-chip-producing giant whose stock has gained more than 30,000% over the past decade.

items.headline: Even a Tesla Model Y safety probe can’t stop the stock’s rally
items.summary_en: Tesla’s stock is on track for its sixth day of gains in a sign of improving sentiment, despite a probe into inoperable doors on 174,290 Model Ys.

items.headline: The hurdles are low for another 10% gain for the S&P 500, says this Wall Street veteran

items.headline: Retail sales are strong for the third month in a row. Economy still seems to be in pretty good shape.
items.summary_en: Retail sales rose at a brisk pace in August for the third month in a row, signaling that U.S. households continue to spend at healthy levels despite worries about lingering inflation and a softening labor market.

items.headline: Trump revives call to ditch quarterly earnings — and this time, the SEC may listen
items.summary_en: European companies already report twice yearly. Trump wants to allow U.S. businesses to do the same.

items.headline: I’m 67. My wife, 48, is financially illiterate. How do I teach her to manage our money? After all, I won’t be around forever.
items.summary_en: “We have a 12-year-old daughter. I have $1.1 million in a traditional IRA and $250,000 in cash.”
